sentences.en: A forest fire is sweeping across portions of north Maine this evening.
sentences.cn: 今晚一场森林大火正席卷缅因州北部的部分地区。

sentences.en: a north-facing window
sentences.cn: 朝北的窗户

sentences.en: Caesar marched north into the forests that border the Danube River.
sentences.cn: 恺撒挥师北上，深入到多瑙河沿岸的森林地带。

sentences.en: Go north on I-15 to the exit just past Barstow.
sentences.cn: 沿着15号州际公路一直向北，一过巴斯托就从出口驶出。

sentences.en: Half of the north-west's timber land is public property.
sentences.cn: 西北部的一半林地是公共财产。

sentences.en: He learnt his trade as a diver in the North Sea.
sentences.cn: 他在北海学会了潜水员这一行的本事。

sentences.en: He lives in North Wales.
sentences.cn: 他住在威尔士北部。

sentences.en: He was born in Yamagata prefecture, north of Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 他出生在东京以北的山形县。

sentences.en: He was taken prisoner in North Africa in 1942.
sentences.cn: 他于1942年在北非被俘。

sentences.en: he's taken a teaching job up north.
sentences.cn: 他在北方干上了教书工作。

sentences.en: More human remains have been unearthed in the north.
sentences.cn: 北部又挖掘出了更多的人体遗骸。

sentences.en: Outside the breeze was fresh and from the north.
sentences.cn: 外面凉飕飕的微风从北面吹来。

sentences.en: The birds fly north in summer.
sentences.cn: 夏季鸟儿向北飞。

sentences.en: The boat was hit by a squall north of the island.
sentences.cn: 船在岛的北边遇到了狂飑。

sentences.en: The general had mustered his troops north of the Hindu Kush.
sentences.cn: 将军在兴都库什山脉以北集结军队。

sentences.en: The scheme mostly benefits people in the North and Midlands.
sentences.cn: 该方案主要的受益者是北部和中部地区的人们。

sentences.en: The western-most part of north Wales is a stronghold of Welsh-speakers.
sentences.cn: 北威尔士最西部是说威尔士语人的聚居区。

sentences.en: To the north are the hot springs of Banyas de Sant Loan.
sentences.cn: 北边是班亚斯德桑隆温泉。

sentences.en: Which way is north?
sentences.cn: 哪边是北？

sentences.en: You can go anywhere and still the compass points north or south.
sentences.cn: 无论走到哪里，罗盘仍然指向北或南。

words.tran_cn: 在东北的；东北方的；来自东北的
北方的，向北的；来自北方的

phrases.tran_cn: 阿拉斯加北坡；北坡油田

trans.tran_cn: 北方的，北部的，朝北的，（风，光线）来自北方的
trans.tran_en: in the north or facing the north

trans.tran_cn: 北方，北部，（美国南北战争时与南方作战的）北部各州，北方发达国家（尤指欧洲和北美各国）
trans.tran_en: the direction that is at the top of a map of the world, above the Equator. It is on the left if you are facing the rising sun
